Only the signature authentication data generated by the cold wallet is used as the consensus identity. The passport does not transfer any security information such as your wallet private key, mnemonics, etc. on the network.

The current node is unavailable, please switch to a new node
Please enter node information in the format: abcda4380ba956abx24915819c47a4908ecabcdx@127.0.0.1:8888

Remarks: 
1, the gateway node information can be found in the settings in the upper right corner of the gateway PC client, click to copy and paste to the top to add. 
2. After the gateway node is selected, free calls and chats can be made through the gateway, and the communication number can be obtained from the number segment of the gateway node when registering. 
3. After registering the communication, the communication number will be retained after switching the gateway node, but a certain Gas fee must be used to transfer the number to the network and register information on the new gateway node.

After the block height, the redemption will no longer be deducted

1. The gateway NXN pledge cannot be less than the minimum self-delegation. When the pledge is less than self-delegation, it will trigger imprisonment. \n2. After the gateway node is pledged, if it is redeemed within 1 month, there will be a loss of %1$s. Non-gateway members do not have this restriction.

Please be sure to read carefully and fully understand the terms of the "Service Agreement" and "Privacy Policy", including but not limited to: In order to provide you with instant messaging, content sharing and other services, we need to collect your Personal information such as device information and operation logs. You can view, change, delete personal information and manage your authorization in "Settings". \nYou can read
Learn more. If you agree, please click "Agree" to start receiving our services.

By entering %1$s into the \ncontract address and destroying\nthem, %2$s computing power can be obtained for mining.
By entering%1$s into the contract address and destroying it, you can obtain a private DVM virtual machine and power.
Purchase DVM virtual machines with an annualized profit of approximately 300%
Currently, for 1 %1$s destroyed, the DVM virtual machine gains %2$s GAS of computing power
The reward for DVM virtual machines is %3$s for every %1$s computing power interval of %2$s memory block heights
Use BNB, USDT to buy DST
Need BNB or USDT equivalent to %sUSD, buy or transfer from others
Use USDT to buy DST, or let others transfer DST for you
You need to destroy %s DST, or you can let someone else do it for you
The Hash computing power obtained by destroying DST has been automatically pledged for mining
How to generate DID number instead of destroying DST
1. Copy the DST address currently in use and send it to the other party;
2. The other party enters the DST destruction mining page, enters the amount of DST to be destroyed and changes the pledge address to your DST address;

3. After the other party completes the DST destruction, open your DST pledge destruction page, at this time, select the DID number segment as a gift, click Generate Communication Signal to generate your DID number;
Please enter the number of DST tokens to buy
Select the token used for payment
This time you will pay about: %1$s (including pancake0.8%% slippage)
After the payment is completed, this contract will complete the purchase, and then automatically cross-chain to the filled DST address

After switching the gateway node, the communication number is retained, but a certain gas fee is required to transfer the number to the network, and the information is registered at the new gateway node. After switching the node, the chat history of the original node will be lost.
waiting to confirm the transaction result
The switch is successful, please log in to the chat account again
Tips:\nCommunity spending proposals can be paid from the community library to reward builders who contribute to DST ecological development.

The number cannot be greater than the remaining amount of the community library
Tips: \nAn upgrade proposal, any optimization provided for the code, can submit an upgrade proposal, and the proposal will be upgraded after the DAO vote is passed.

Reminder: \nUpgrade proposal, DST is a completely decentralized community, any optimization provided for the code, you can submit an upgrade proposal, and the proposal will be upgraded after the DAO votes through it.

Upgrade the existing APP. After the vote is passed, the node gateway will automatically synchronize and package it, and then push the upgrade. The user needs to manually click to confirm.
Modify and upgrade the existing DST chain nodes. After the vote is passed, they will be upgraded immediately, and the communication gateway nodes do not need to be downloaded again.
Modify and upgrade the existing gateway. After the vote is passed, the gateway node will receive an upgrade push and needs to be manually upgraded.
Please try checking the network or switching to another node
Tips:\nSelect the proposal type according to the guide, and finally need to pay the proposal deposit to initiate the proposal.
parameter proposal, decentralized organizational structure, voting for modification of parameters on the chain.
The community expenditure proposal can be paid from the community library to reward builders who contribute to the ecological development of DST.
An upgrade proposal, any optimization provided for the code, can submit an upgrade proposal, and the proposal will be upgraded after the DAO votes.
Reminder:\nparameter proposal, decentralized organizational structure, voting for modification of parameters on the chain.
Please choose to fill in the parameter value to be modified
greater than or equal to 0, less than or equal to 1, precision 18 bits
The maximum growth rate of pledge
greater than or equal to 0, less than or equal to 1, precision 18 bits
greater than or equal to 0, less than or equal to 1, precision 18 bits
The minimum value of the pledge rate when the minimum integral growth is reached
greater than 0, less than 1, precision 18 digits
Increase the number of completed blocks
The minting module is a parameter of the DPOS pledge module.
The Staking module is a parameter of the DPOS governance module.
Chat module is the modification of communication-related parameters.
Gateway module is a gateway management module parameter.
pledge module is to destroy pledge parameters.
The slashing module is the parameter of the prison penalty module.
The maximum number of entries in redemption
An integer greater than or equal to 0
The maximum number of DID numbers held by each user
An integer greater than or equal to 1 and less than or equal to 10000

Through proposal and voting supervision, ensure that every member of the organization has a voice, everything happens on the chain, and is 100% open and transparent.
Number of active members in the group:
Total pledge amount of the group:
DAO organization governance pool spending proposal
Tips: \nDAO organization governance pool proposal can be paid from the DAO organization governance pool to reward builders who contribute to cluster development.
Please enter the amount of expenditure
Please enter the purpose of fund application
DAO organization collective computing power authorization proposal

Tips: \nThe DAO organization\'s collective computing power authorization proposal can authorize the organization\'s collective DVM virtual machine computing power to the corresponding contract, which requires a collective voting decision by the organization. Authorization time is on the chain
DAO organization collective computing power authorization proposal
DAO organization collective DVM virtual machine
Stay online for 30 minutes every day to complete the contribution of network equipment nodes to the DAO collective. This will not consume too much network traffic.
Oh, I almost completed the contribution to the collective equipment network node of the DAO organization yesterday. Everyone is looking forward to your completion! 😀😀😀
You have completed 2 consecutive days of DAO organization collective equipment network node dedication to the DAO collective, accelerating the construction of the DAO. Keep up the good work!
Please enter the quantity of %s to be destroyed
Get GAS computing power pledge address
Please enter the pledge address to obtain GAS computing power

1. Use %1$s to purchase a DVM mining machine, and the corresponding GAS computing power will be dynamically obtained according to the proportion on the chain. The obtained computing power set will be packaged as a private DVM virtual machine in the group. 
2. You can purchase %2$s on the BSC chain exchange, and then cross-chain to the %3$s main chain for destruction and mining. 
3. Individuals who participate in the creation can obtain frozen computing power according to the subscription amount. 1 frozen computing power can be unfrozen into 1 computing power, and at the same time, the cluster will accumulate 1%4$s of destruction. 
4. When acquiring new computing power, the DVM computing power rewards that are currently unclaimed will be automatically claimed.
Insufficient online time, DAO is collectively affected
Today, your participation in the DAO organization’s collective equipment network donation has been completed, and the DAO organization has collectively issued you POS equipment rewards.
POS device rewards can be collected
The first DVM virtual machine income can be collected. This increases the scale of DAO\'s collective digital assets and your income is approximately higher than before purchase
Your DVM virtual machine continues to contribute to the scale of DAO collective assets
DVM virtual machine income can be collected
Congratulations, the device cluster %s has been successfully created. This is an efficient, open, transparent and autonomous Dao collective.
\" Hi, welcome to join the %s device cluster, which is an efficient, open, transparent and autonomous Dao organization collective\"
Equipment cluster %1$s has been upgraded to %2$s, and the DAO collective has taken another step forward, which is inseparable from your dedication!
The device cluster level is upgraded to
Your POS equipment reward was not claimed last time and has been collectively taken back by DAO. Remember to claim it in time!
DAO invites you to create a device cluster. This will help DAO collectively have more computing power and your income will also increase.
DAO invites you to create a device cluster
Continue to participate in the construction of the DAO organization collective, keep up the good work
Your group owner’s salary can be collected. Joining the DAO collective does not mean giving up your personal rights. The DAO collective will pay you your salary!
You can receive the salary issued by DAO
A change in cluster information has been detected and cluster %s has been automatically entered. Your private DVM virtual machine and income will not be affected.
A change in cluster information has been detected and it has automatically entered the cluster. Your private DVM virtual machine and income will not be affected.
A change in cluster information has been detected and cluster %s has been automatically exited. Your private DVM virtual machine and income will not be affected.
Detected changes in cluster information and automatically exited the cluster. Your private DVM virtual machine and income will not be affected.
Purchase a DVM virtual machine and participate in the voting and governance of the DAO collective. The annualized income is 300%, and the computing power can be deducted from the GAS fee
There is an equipment reward that has been idle for a long time and can be used to formally participate in DAO collective governance
POS device rewards have been idle for a long time
Increase the computing power of your DVM virtual machine, which will help the DAO collectively have more computing power, and your income will also increase.
Increase your DVM virtual machine computing power
Increase DVM virtual machine computing power

It is detected that you have switched the communication gateway. The cluster %s you created needs to be migrated. The private DVM virtual machines and income in the cluster will not be lost or affected.
It is detected that the cluster %s you created has been successfully migrated. The private DVM virtual machines and income in the cluster will not be lost or affected.
Receive the DST airdrop immediately, which can be used to pay GAS fees for contracts related to the DST chain
POS equipment rewards have been withdrawn by the DAO organization, collect them early next time

Each salary represents the DAO organization’s collective recognition of your work in hosting the equipment cluster! %1$s Stable and upward cluster online rate and DVM total computing power will allow you to get higher wages!

Too many offline devices will lead to a reduction in the revenue of the DAO organization\'s governance pool. The cluster will hold a group leader election every 6 years. All group members will vote together, and the next election will be 14,400 blocks away.

Too many offline devices will lead to a reduction in the income of the DAO organization\'s governance pool. The cluster will conduct a group leader election every 6 years. All group members will vote together, and the next election will be 14,400 blocks away.
